website_summaries.verdict: The response for the Salomon Speedcross 5 was positive. Purchasers who have tested it were suitably happy with what they were able to get from this trail running shoe. The outsole unit was highlighted by consumers because it was apparently efficient at adhering to the ground, giving surface control at all times. They reported that it was versatile and able to handle both rough and soft terrains. The secure upper configuration and responsive midsole were also dutifully praised. On the other hand, some people felt that the upper was not as ventilated as they expected.
pros: People who have tried the Salomon Speedcross 5 felt that the midsole unit dutifully offered underfoot comfort
Some consumers felt that the external pad of this trail companion was able to provide reliable traction
Snow and mud didn’t stand a chance against this running shoe, according to some testers
they didn’t experience any slippage on those kinds of surfaces
The in-shoe hug of the upper unit was considered by runners to be comfortable and secure
A couple of reviewers noted that the collar of the Salomon Speedcross 5 was able to hold the foot and keep it in place
Purchasers liked the general durability of this running shoe
they felt that it could handle what the trails could give them
cons: A few reviewers noted that the upper unit of this running shoe was not as breathable as hoped

customer_reviews.title: Best running/training shoes I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered a second pair of these shoes because they are incredible. Very light, they fit great and even after months of hard use, feel like I'm wearing 'new shoes' still. I had heard of these shoes from people I've trained with but just never got around to getting a pair until a few months ago. After several months of use I can say these are the best shoes I've ever owned. They are durable, despite their lightness and they really help your feet if your on them for a long period of time. Had my first pair for working out and just got another pair to wear day to day. Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Julian P. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Best Trail Running Shoe Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Handled loose dirt, mud and steep trails like a Billy Goat! Great cushion but not too much. Amazing support, quick laces stayed tight. Took a few puddles with out water penetration . Ran 10 miles out of the box with no discomfort. *I did few miles on pavement and they were fine but this would not be my top pick for concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Same great feel... size down from older versions!
customer_reviews.text: Been stomping around in versions of Speedcross since 2011. I think this is my 5th pair, usually get about 2 years of moderate trial use. With the V5 they seem to run a bit larger so I dropped from 10.5 to 10 and they fit great. Lugs seem beefier and likely to hold up longer. If you've never tried these you should! Comfortable, super on almost any type of terrain, especially loose gravely stuff.
customer_reviews.author: armada68

customer_reviews.title: Just crushed rim to rim Grand Canyon in these bad boys
customer_reviews.text: These shoes came last Wednesday. I did two 3-mile walks around my neighborhood to get a feel for them and see if any hotspots cropped up. That Saturday I decided to roll the dice and with limited wear I put in 25 miles going rim-to-rim in the Grand Canyon. Super, super comfortable and minimal blisters despite being more-or-less brand new. I may never go back to my Salomon boots which are heavier. Granted, these don't have the ankle support and durable leather to protect, but for a well trafficked trail like the Grand Canyon offers they were beyond perfect. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: darsptuprov

customer_reviews.title: Speedcross 5s
customer_reviews.text: I own many pairs of Saloman shoes. Before I bought these I questioned how they could have improved the comfort ability and style. Arrived in standard saloman shoe box I tried them on perfect fit as expected. In fact I love the new speedcross 5s that I bought two more pair. Fun colors A+ comfort lift and durability. The tread is more aggressive than the speedcross 4s. I work as a nurse and they are the only pair of shoes I’ll wear. Completely solved my achy feet issues @ Work.
customer_reviews.author: J Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Good trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had an older model but they ran a little narrow. They were a 9 1/2 and were snug. I hoped they would stretch but they never did. This time I bought a 10 and they're much more comfortable. I especially like the lacing system, they stay tied, unlike some other trail shoes that always come loose or are too long. I'd suggest buying your normal size, then a 1/2 size larger. You can always return the ones that don't quite fit right. Very aggressive treads and stable in soft dirt. Also works well as a golf shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoebassguiy

customer_reviews.title: Dominate jagged rocks with these Salomons
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are phenomenal, functional and stylish. They have earned their reputation carrying me over jagged rocks in the desert while mentally taking me on an escape to a sandy beach! The insoles are so soft while the shoes are nicely snug, fitting just right, and the soles are rock solid, shredding over rocks of all sizes from 1 to 8 inches in diameter. Very happy with these shoes which are now my official go-to trail runners. 5 super shiny stars for excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: v3rtuoso

customer_reviews.title: Here's to 4 more years!
customer_reviews.text: The muddy pair have been around ther world. Hiked and biked hundreds of miles. Excellent shoes! Hope the new are just as good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A step forward , now steps backward
customer_reviews.text: The fit was not as I have experienced before. I ran with this big cross pro for quite a while and enjoyed it very much. When I receive the product it was not the color I had expected. The word “grape leaf“ conjures up different looks for different people I guess. Meanwhile the shoe did not fit as well as expected. The instep was uncomfortable quite unexpectedly. It did not encompass my foot like a glove as a prior shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Mcauliff

customer_reviews.title: Another homerun!
customer_reviews.text: I have been an avid fan of these trails shoes for almost a decade.I have owned and heavily used and abused the 3s 4s and now 5s. These are just as comfy, have better grip, feel lighter but they do run a bit wider. They are the best trail shoe in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Barkhaus

customer_reviews.title: Work extremely well
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I hike probably 4-5 times a week in the mornings, about 5 miles each time. The trail is dirt + rocks. These shoes are perfect, and I've been using them for maybe 1 month now. They are lightweight but get good traction and are sturdy. I sometimes jog a bit but not often. Overall, I highly recommend these shoes. My wife wears tennis shoes, and I see her frequently slip way more than I do.
customer_reviews.author: shannon johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement
customer_reviews.text: Salomon speedcross 5 is an excellent shoe, has more room than speedcross 4. I bought a 9.5 as usual. Bigger lugs for a big grip on mud.
customer_reviews.author: sherwin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, great color!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband who likes a bit of color. The Solomon speed cross shoes are a favorite among my gang in Alaska where we find ourselves in all types of terrain. The aggressive sole gives me confidence to tromp around and I'm not a super athlete by far. So the confidence is a big factor for me. As for my husband, he is loathe to buy something new if he has something 20+ years designed for the same purpose. So I have to do it for him. These lightweight shoes have been a great success! Maybe now we can get rid of some of those oldies!!!
customer_reviews.author: kit

customer_reviews.title: Best Trail Shoe I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid outdoor adventurer and these trail shoes are Amazing! 5' 10" , 180lbs. Fit like a comfortable glove with great all around foot support. The soles grip extremely well on wet pavement, rocks, slick rocks and uneven trails. I feel energized each time I wear them for a hike. The lace keeper is a Salomon touch that I love and there is also a slim area on the tongue to hold a folded $20. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: T.P.

customer_reviews.title: Any surface, anytime and anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: This product has so far surpassed my best expectations, I work at a mens 90 day alcohol/addiction treatment facility. We do a lot of outdoor activities volleyball, mountain biking, pickleball, softball and other things to help them feel better about themselves and being a part of the community. These shoes have stood up to all those activities and more the surfaces and varied and other shoes fail often but not these. They have stood up to this ' shoe grinder ' situations and excelled. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Zucco

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've been an avid hiker for 30 years. I usually wear minimalist shoes and don't like bulky hiking boots. However, on major hikes throughout Colorado, I needed something a little more substantial that won't take way the feel for the trail. These work great. I've done three hikes in them and they allow a good feel for rocks, while still providing great grip and protection. I'm becoming a real Solomon fan.
customer_reviews.author: E.Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide feet and have always preferred Asic Nimbus for my running shoes. These fit just right, not too narrow, not to wide. Extremely comfortable, right up there with Asics, I love them. Not to mention they look 10x more badass than Asics ever did (I got the flint). If I had to find a weakness, it’s that the the treat is a little aggressive, almost cleat-like, so I imagine it will wear down fairly quick. But who cares? You get one hell of a grip in the meantime and even when running through mud the chevrons are spaced out enough that they shed clumps easily. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Completely Improved!
customer_reviews.text: The Speedcross 5 has been improved over the 4 model in every way imo. They have opened up the toe box giving more room and switched to a material that has more flex in the upper. The rubber on the outsole is now higher quality. The raised collar height is also a welcome improvement! The 5 model has more cushion in the heel area as well. This is a great outdoorsman's shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Trail Running Shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is the shoe i've been searching for. No break in required, fit like a custom tailored suit & perfect comfort. Just did a 12.5 mile trail run in them yesterday morning and have zero complaints. If you've been looking for the perfect trail running shoe for any and all terrain this is it. Buy a pair, you'll thank yourself and tell all your friends. Promise.
customer_reviews.author: JBood

customer_reviews.title: The heal is the deal.
customer_reviews.text: My last shoe was the Speedcross 4 which is my favorite shoe. The 5 is better in the heal and the tread is a little deeper and harder, which seems like it could help it last longer. The 4's fit for me is unbelievable because I have a narrow foot but the 5's heal is just so much better. The price was the same for both shoes. Salomon is great.
customer_reviews.author: P. C. Chinn

customer_reviews.title: not worth money inside tears down with little use in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I wear these sneakers just to the gym and only go to gym 4 days a week for about 1 hour. 2 months old already have internal wear. never had this problem with Nike that Id wear all day for year before this might happen or New Balance. Wont be buying this brand anymore
customer_reviews.author: Lord Sirc

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again and recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for all day wear on any surface. No noise when walking on indoor flooring surfaces, except if bottoms are wet. When purchased, I could not find wides, but even so, they fit comfortably. Very aggressive bottoms for outdoor wear, so make sure you are picking your feet up while walking in grasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first time Solomon shoe buyer, and Im impressed. These are some of the best fitting shoes i've pruchased in a long time. I do a lot of trail hiking, walking, jogging and these are perfect for that. I will also be anxious to try them out in softball as well. I don't like regular cleats, so a prefer to buy aggresive tread trail shoes to play ball in. I'm excited to try these out and see how they hold up. Otherwise these shoes fit great, are comfortable, and so far I love the pull string tie. Quality stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe... not sure about the smell
customer_reviews.text: Had the Speedcross 4 and loved them. Took them through everything! Bought the Speedcross 5 and love 'em just as much, BUT... I got them wet on only my 4th outing with them and they now they smell like cat urine. No, a cat didn't pee in them. Tried a few different things and the smell is slowly going away, but I'm worried about the next time they get wet, because they will. Not sure if there's a different adhesive being used or not, but my SC4's didn't ever smell no matter what I did to them.
customer_reviews.author: ijustwander

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected and great traction
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and they fit perfectly! I purchased them to wear when working in our yard which is about two acres and all of it sloped. They really are light and comfortable, and give great traction when on slope, especially when walking across a slope rather than up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Salomons wore out after 200 miles/4 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Salomons August 5/2020. First, these are the most comfortable Trail Running Shoes I've ever had. Good support, I was loving them, that is until the out-sole (or tread) started wearing down quickly on the heel. After 250 miles of running, the sole is almost dine on the heel. I had Adidas Terrex before and didn't experience such a rapid wear like with the Salomons. Very disappointing for a $130.00 shoe. Like buying a Pirelli Tire where the treat is gone shortly after driving a few hundred miles.
customer_reviews.author: HaTo

customer_reviews.title: Not so lucky, might have defective set.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, great fit, but I might got defective set. After about 20 miles of total hiking In California parks, the shoelace snapped from the bottom loop. You can see that there should be more material in that loop since to hold the pressure from shoelace mechanism. I hope someone will reach out to me on solution. The shoes are now used and I’m not sure if I can return them.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Radchenko

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong With Salomon Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the style, look, and durability. This is a tactical sound pair of shoes for my line of work. This is my new EDS (Every Day Shoes).
customer_reviews.author: Bigg Eazy

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I love the Solomon's. These are my first Solomon 'ankle' shoes, I've owned their 4D GTX boots (fantastic as well). These have small cleats in them. At first I thought it would hinder walking, running, but no. These are good trail shoes. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Durable highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go hiking in Colorado. These have excellent grip on gravel as well as rocks. Even when the rocks are slightly wet. I was able to have a blast climbing rocks and walking/running trails! They got pretty dirty but wiped off with water and a towel!! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. they look great too! by far the best fitting running shoes I have. I run on desert trails in Arizona and the traction in the sand and loose rock is fantastic.. I don't have to worry about slipping when running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 30 minute life span - poorly made, was a surprise from Salomon.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe lasted 30 minutes after unboxing before seams came unglued. worse part is, i'm serving overseas where no outgoing mail is available so cant return this Chinese junk. The pics say it all - 30 minutes of wear was to much. Sidewall (3rd pic) popped free of material and bubbled out. Could not believe it after years of wearing salomons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoes don’t even have 20 miles on them and they are already falling apart. I was so excited about getting a great pair of trail shoes and the quality is so disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: hdigabtt

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sneaker
customer_reviews.text: quality comfort form and fit you get it all when you buy anything Solomon. I have 3 other pairs and all perform and fit perfect. Way better then Nike or any of the other big brand shoes. Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sennit

customer_reviews.title: Great for trail runs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these for trail running. Great fit and easy to clean after my run in some mud. Traction has been great. A good shoe that deserves your consideration. Oh and the size was spot on for me. I wear a 9 and ordered these in a 9.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe. Has small issues.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are comfortable as previous shoes. Only issue is the heel inside the shoe has already started to wear and has a small hole. Not normal to wear so quick.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great design and fabric
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved them! Salomons are his favorite hiking shoes. They are true to size and excellent quality. The fabric looks and feels great. It’s worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: These shoes say they as good for cross country but they are not
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Backpacking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I use these for backpacking and they are great! The tread helps secure my footing on the trail and the lightweight construction helps me log more miles with less fatigue as the shoes do not weigh down my feet like a pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: James Norris

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after 1 month of wearing them
customer_reviews.text: For the first time I purchased a pair of Solomon hiking trail running shoes. I am quite disappointed in them. I have worn them for just a little more than a month while taking my 3-5 miles morning hikes in the Coachella Valley desert, and they are already ripping out at the front toe and the sides are starting to tear away from the shoe. I paid 2 times more than I normally spend on my Adidas trail shoes that lasted 2 years... Very disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: desertbarney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, appreciate the stretch tongue and lacing. Gives me the ability to slip on and off without having to tie!
customer_reviews.author: david S.

customer_reviews.title: Inside of heels wore out in a matter of hours.
customer_reviews.text: Ran for about in hours in these shoes, three times. After the third time, the inside of the heels (where my foot contacts the inside of the shoe) started to wear. After I ran in the shoes a few more times, the inside of the heels were heavily worn and were starting to give me blisters. I had to use duct tape and some cloth to repair the inside of the shoes! My advice is that these shoes are nowhere near as durable as they appear.
customer_reviews.author: Smegmite

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of shoes from Salomon and I am now "addicted". They are the most comfortable shoes I have ever had, I use for my workout and in fact drive in them all day working. They look good and feel even better.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Bigambo

customer_reviews.title: Lovin them step by step
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed lightweight, and very comfortable fit. I wore them to work and got water splashed on them and instantly beaded up. I work alot sporting events and needing a comfortable reliable shoe. I am glad I gave Salomon a try.
customer_reviews.author: Cooter

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of Speedcross 3 shoes that finally bit the dust .... they were very comfortable for hiking so I moved up to the 5 and they are even more comfortable than the 3 model. I usually wear a 7.5 size but an 8 in these shoes is perfect. Keep that in mind when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great trail traction
customer_reviews.text: Trail running they have great traction but I sometimes feel rocks through the sole mostly the front, also I can’t seem to get the laces tight enough they feel loose maybe to big although the length is good
customer_reviews.author: Armon johnson

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is WOW. The shoe is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Comfort amazing, look amazing, fit amazing. This is an amazing product for use in both short and long distance, with multiple pair to swap out during the runs. 3 pairs right now (different colors)
customer_reviews.author: Amazonoholics

customer_reviews.title: Replace Insoles with Merrell Kenetic Fit Advanced insoles.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe! Wore out my 4s and love the 5s even more! Especially good for those with flat feet— like me. I recommend replacing the factory insert with the “Merrell Kenetic Fit Advanced” insoles. Better stability and comfort. The Ortholites are pretty weak.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think it would be possible but they fit better than the pair of Speedcross 4 shoes I have
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Speedcross 4's almost 2 years ago and wore them pretty much everywhere. They were the most comfortable shoes I have ever bought. After 2 years I wore out the bottom of my shoes. I ordered the Speedcross 5 to replace the 4 as my primary walking, hiking, travel shoe and amazingly they fit better right away. I would buy again in a heartbeat and probably will order another pair soon with different color combo to change things up.
customer_reviews.author: John P Koebel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sneakers for true to size and very comfortable. I used it for a shooting competition in wet grass and didn't slip. I would definitely buy again but would get the waterproof fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than they appear
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are narrow but comfortable. While I prefer wider shoes, these fit well. I still have to hike in these to have a final verdict.
customer_reviews.author: GDM

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is LEGIT!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is hands down, the most comfortable running shoe I've ever invested on! Sure its a bit pricey, but you get what you pay for...I run dirt hills, and I definitely feel the difference on the grip on the shoe, im not slipping or sliding, i feel i have more balance when i run! I also come across a lot of rocks, I run through them like nothing is there.. I don't normally write reviews unless my mind is blown, thats how I feel about this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto G.

customer_reviews.title: Bye Nike
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had about every color , I go through 5 pairs of these a year . I walk a lot for work and my feet feel great .
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Shoes Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I now have 4 pair of these shoes and will continue to buy them in the future. My feet love them and yours will too!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Eatley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT shoes.  Possible the best I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome trail and snow running shoes. Quite possibly the best running shoe I have ever owned-track, trail or pavement. Super comfortable, much better than the 4's. Fit is the same as 4's. Aggressive tread but soft feel. No rubbing on ankles.
customer_reviews.author: John Baker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your daily shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes actually fit perfectly for me. I bought them for my daily walking shoes as well as for an occasional run or hike and they work perfectly! I had another pair of Solomon’s that were great in general but hurt my shins running, I don’t seem to have that issue with these ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was a tad bit smaller than other size 12 tennis shoes I have and also very narrow. Aside from that I really like the shoe, Ill reorder in a wide an a 1/2 size bigger on the next pair.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Heel Comfort For Sure
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, sleek shoe. The toe is not too fat or bulky and they are of nice quality and heel cushion. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Real Salomons
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best I've ever worn, a lot of places don't carry them and Amazon sells them the same price that the Salomon websites sells them for so its win win all around
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the grip on the shoes! The quick lacing it’s great, keep your feet snug and tight. But the heel it’s a bit too high for me, it made my feet hurt after a short trail run. Other than that, it’s good!
customer_reviews.author: Goli

customer_reviews.title: Great trail runner.
customer_reviews.text: Best trail shoes ever. Went with this pair for the summer. Already put 50 miles in on them and they feel great. Super sturdy and great traction on steep trails. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe review

customer_reviews.title: Second pair in 5 years, great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These are simply the best shoe money can buy for trekking and trails. Also snow and ice.
customer_reviews.author: Ekimv

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: Salomon makes in my opinion the best trail running shoes available- comfortable and tough !
customer_reviews.author: stan mcalister

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved these. Gave him as a gift. He is a veteran so he really enjoyed the color. Great price and authentic
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Buying another pair
customer_reviews.text: These are what any competitor in the class of shoe worries about. Sturdy, comfortable, breath, strong fabric, easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: jobidiah

customer_reviews.title: Off to a great start!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Great fit and very comfortable. I’m on my feet a lot and so far this has done the trick. Also very stylish even with the larger size ( a lot of times when they make the shoes in the larger sizes they don’t have the same look any more. There do. ). This is my first pair but i will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: They fit very well. I admit I was concerned about how narrow they looked, but the fit was great. I love the leaving system, my first time trying it. I haven't used them on a real run yet, but for walking they've been very comfortable. After a run, might add the 5th star or subtract, depending on how they do.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Harbert

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for Hiking the Rockies
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome. These are the 2nd pair I have ordered. Great support while hiking in the Rockies or in the New Mexico desert. Light but supportive. Can’t say enough about how well these shoes fit.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: Shoe broke in very well
customer_reviews.text: Felt a little tight at first. Very comfortable to walk in. I'm getting another pair
customer_reviews.author: clem

customer_reviews.title: First pair of Salomons and love them
customer_reviews.text: They were pretty snug out of the box. After 10 minutes they were contoured to my feet, and wore them to work the next day. I have a 60ft high hill in my back yard and didn't even come close to slipping. Great shoe overall. I'll be buying more
customer_reviews.author: sean miller

customer_reviews.title: Great rugged shoe out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, light, and very grippy. No break in period needed. I am a size 13 US and they fit perfectly. I can’t wait to spend some time in them and I hope they last as well as they do everything else!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Sizing changed for me.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these since the inception of the speed crosses. I've always worn a 10 but with the 5s a 10 was too big. Dropped .5 a size and they fit prefect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best trail runner I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Best trail running shoe 6 years in a row. Used each version of these since 2014 all over the world. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Schunterphil

customer_reviews.title: super supportive
customer_reviews.text: Have had this brand in the past...will stick with it
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: The bomb!
customer_reviews.text: The bomb. Love these for hiking and long and steep trails. Great traction and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: john joseph van sack

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe, will buy again
customer_reviews.text: By looking at it, I expected this shoe to feel a little like wearing cleats, but they aren't at all. Very comfortable, and light. I wear these everywhere now.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Gage

customer_reviews.title: Incredible fit and durability
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Speedcross shoes. They hold up forever and support my feet like no other shoe. Grip is second to none. I was hesitant about the speed lace but love the fact that you can tuck it away into it's own pouch. Brilliant design. (My first pair that I bought lasted 4 years! I have just retired them to mowing shoes now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Even better than my 4s and the color is stunning so comfy!
customer_reviews.author: bethany

customer_reviews.title: Support
customer_reviews.text: Moving up from the Inov-8’s I found these to have a much more comfortable sole and much better arch. I’m a bigger OCR guy (6’3, 200lbs) so the extra support is welcomed. I’d definitely recommend them. My only concern is the lacing system as I really like laces and tying my shoes. I’m afraid of ripping these things apart, but I guess I’ll see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Agata Draper

customer_reviews.title: Another great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of hiking shoes that I purchased! They are by far the best. Also this is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It’s comfy when running, but laces feel flimsy, feels like it will break when laced up. But has been working fine, time will only tell.
customer_reviews.author: kkrayzien8tive

customer_reviews.title: This wears out fast
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the durability of this shoe. Purchased it April 12, 2020 and the soles are already worn out. Also, the inside cushion/liner for the back of the heel has also worn through to the shell, so I now have great blister machines for each of my heels. They didn't even last 6 months. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: New favorite trail shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for an aggressive trail shoe! My favorite trail shoe for technical trails and mid distance trail runs! Traction and protection are top notch! I was very surprised how much trail feel there is with a very moderate amount of cushioning!
customer_reviews.author: Gpiercer

customer_reviews.title: These feel amazing
customer_reviews.text: The nicest most comfortable pair of shoes I've ever had on my feet I'm extremely impressed
customer_reviews.author: Todd Embree

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Speedcross 4
customer_reviews.text: An improvement on an already awesome shoe...Salomon does it again!
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Great arch support, grip is fantastic, and holds up in all terrain. Narrow fit and small. I usually am a 10-10.5 wide. I order 11s or a 11 wide in this sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The comfort, very comfortable shoe and I like the way you don’t have to lace them up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Such A Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Such a good shoe. I where them all day-everyday. Have a pair for work and play
customer_reviews.author: craig w hargrave

customer_reviews.title: Insane Grip
customer_reviews.text: I was able to walk upside down on my ceiling - nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Nootens

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Fit perfectly. I recommend trying them on in store before purchasing any shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Fit perfectly. I recommend finding the product in a store and trying them on before purchasing any shoe.
customer_reviews.author: J. L.

customer_reviews.title: Buy these for trails
customer_reviews.text: Amazing trail running shoe. The quick laces, fit, water resistance, and weight are all excellent. The blues ones look great too.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck LeDuc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe for the novice hiker,walker
customer_reviews.text: The color and size are perfect,very happy with the purchase. Salomon is a reputable company and will continue to buy from this company.Product arrived on time and packaged well. Looks like my sons want a pair also
customer_reviews.author: Logan Fortune

customer_reviews.title: Multi sport all around great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box comfortable, played 18 holes on a rocky, rainy, hilly course and was dry and foot-secure all day. Feel better than golf shoes. Will run in them too.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The Speedcross 5 runs about 1/2 of a size bigger than the Speedcross 4
customer_reviews.text: I really like Salomon shoes, especially since they don’t arrogantly take sides in a highly charged, political/racial battle, DIRECTLY in the public eye!
customer_reviews.author: Green Monster

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, Slightly narrow, slightly heavy
customer_reviews.text: The fit on these are a touch narrower than I’m used to (in a good way). And these are a bit heavy (compared to Altra/Hoka). That being said they’re still a favorite shoe in my rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits great came when expected and so far has met every or exceeded all of my expectations of it. I've had it with me in the water, mud, dirt, hiking, trail running, kayaking, biking. I've put this shoe to the test and its stood up to it all great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: James Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Salomon speedcross 5
customer_reviews.text: I use them for Work, extremely comfortable, going to by a couple more pairs
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for serious off-road running
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for off-road trail running and competitive orienteering. They are the perfect combination of toughness, lightness and grippiness. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: jg

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have the speedcross 4 since they came out and wore them to death. The speedcross fives are taking the Fours to the next level. They're pretty much the best shoe ever in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid hiker and runner. This shoe is the best shoe on the market hands down. Fits well and grips the pavement and hiking trails.
customer_reviews.author: JR

product_meta.title: SALOMON Men's Speedcross 4 Trail Running Shoe
product_meta.description: To create the next generation speed cross 5, we went back to the source code, capitalizing on the values that make speed cross legendary. Even more grip, and a more dynamic upper set a new high-bar on performance and fit. And with better stability and a refined look, A new Legend has arrived.
feature_bullets: TRAIL RUNNING SHOES: Featuring an aggressive grip, precise foothold, & protection, the Salomon Speedcross 5 is the ideal shoe for runners who want to conquer soft, technical trails.

GET ROUGH: Redesigned with deep, sharp lugs for an improved grip & a more dynamic upper for better fit & stability, the Speedcross 5 is the perfect shoe for trail runners who aren't afraid of wet & dirty terrain.

GO THE DISTANCE: Whether you love daily road running in your neighborhood, an escape to a local trail, or something more rugged, Salomon makes shoes that ensure you have a smooth ride on any & all terrain.
TIME TO PLAY: Whether you are into trail running, hiking, backpacking, or mountaineering, Salomon has shoes & gear for kids, men & women to help you conquer a new distance, personal record, or event!
SINCE 1947 Salomon has used our passion for outdoor sports & innovation to create progressive gear. Our road & trail running shoes, hiking sneakers, boots, & water shoes help make any path your own.
